#id=1
#text=As I hung the phone with my friend , I was very excited .
#id=2
#text=I was going to visit her today , and I would get to travel by train .
#id=3
#text=I called for a taxi , then quickly packed up a day bag with a few things I would need .
#id=4
#text=As the taxi took me to the train station , I realized I had not traveled by train in many years , and wondered what might have changed .
#id=5
#text=As soon as I arrived , it was obvious .
#id=6
#text=Now you didnt have to wait in line to buy tickets from a person , but instead from a machine .
#id=7
#text=I found one that was unused , and stepped up to read the directions .
#id=8
#text=I thought this was very confusing , until a station employee stopped and explained the process to me .
#id=9
#text=Soon I had my ticket , and was walking to line where I would await the train 's arrival .
#text=If was not far , and there was even an empty bench seat .
#text=Soon the train arrived and I stepped up into the car printed on my ticket , and found my seat .
#text=After the train was in motion , a conductor came by to check and punch my ticket .
#text=He smiled , and told me to have a good trip .
